entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:37 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023
